Text:
Buy site (didn't attach in description for some reason):
http://www.dlsite.com/ecchi-eng/work/=/product_id/RE087520

Please support the authors if you enjoy this game!
It's most likely to be censored. DLSite is based in Japan, so even their English titles (which this isn't) have to follow Japanese law.
Yes, it's pixelated, but the art and sound is good, and the censoring isn't too much IMO.
